documents.title: dog starts fire in kitchen
text: you read that right .
and no , it did n't leave the chip pan on after getting back from the pub .
the pesky pooch climbed on top of a cooker in a sandiacre kitchen , turning the electric hob on , firefighters believe .
it then knocked a bin over , which caught fire at about midnight on saturday .
luckily the smoke alarm sounded and the homeowner and her clumsy pet escaped to safety , where they were given oxygen treatment by firefighters from long eaton and stapleford stations .
author: Dave Wade
BBC Local Live

documents.title: m1 death man named
text: the man who died on the m1 , near trowell services , on friday has been named as vincent nagle .
the 44-year-old , from station road , borrowash died after colliding with a lorry on the motorway at about 11:30 .
derbyshire police said his death was linked to the murder of claire nagle , in station road in the village about half an hour earlier .
nathan paton , 22 , who was injured at the house remains in the queen 's medical centre , where he is receiving treatment for head injuries , believed to have been caused by a nail gun .
author: Dave Wade
BBC Local Live

documents.title: derby terror raid : police given more time
text: detectives have been granted more time to question five men who were arrested in burton and derby last monday on sus of terror offences .

the north east counter terrorism unit had a warrant of detention that lasted until this morning but over the weekend , a court gave them until boxing day to charge or release the men - or apply for a further extension .

documents.title: sports personality of the year 2016 : peaty comes 11th in vote
text: staffordshire and city of derby swimmer adam peaty came 11th in the vote for the bbc sports personality of the year award .
andy murray won the accolade for a record third time after claiming his second wimbledon title , olympic gold and became tennis ' world number one in a remarkable 2016 .
he won with more than 247,419 votes while uttoxeter 's peaty got 11,129 .
uttoxeter 's peaty made the shortlist after smashing his own world record to take olympic gold in the men 's 100m breaststroke .
author: BBC Sport

documents.title: borrowash deaths : village left in shock
text: reverend sumpter said the village was in shock and that one of his parishioners , who came to nathan 's aid , was left traumatised .
he said : `` these things when they happen anytime of year they 're so tragic but particularly this time of year , leading up to christmas .
`` someone from our church here was involved in offering first aid .
`` she had her baby with her and she offered the blanket from the baby for the son who was severly injured .
it 's going to take people a long time to get over the trauma of these tragic events . ''
author: Khia Lewis-Todd
BBC Local Live

documents.title: postal strikes : derby and matlock open
text: if you can remember on friday i told you that derby city post office and matlock post office may be closed today because of a strike .
the communication workers union are in a dispute over pensions , job security and branch closures .
good news is both derby and matlock branches will remain open .
author: Khia Lewis-Todd
BBC Local Live

documents.title: borrowash attacks : 'ordinary lovely , loving family '
text: the reverend timothy sumpter , from st stephens church in borrowash , said although he never met the family he 's spoken to many people who knew them .
`` the impression that i get is of an ordinary lovely , loving family that would do anything for you and were therefore liked a lot and had a very strong network of friends within the community . ''
author: Khia Lewis-Todd
BBC Local Live

documents.title: borrowash attacks : 'he was just thinking purely of his family '
text: local tattooist taz daley told bbc radio derby he tried to help nathan while they waited for an ambulance .
`` he was n't delirious he just basically said this has happened and that he needed to get back there , he 'd got younger brothers and sisters and he needed to get back to look after them .
`` he was n't thinking of himself even though he was in such bad condition , he was just thinking purely of his family , '' mr daley said .
author: Khia Lewis-Todd
BBC Local Live

documents.title: borrowash deaths : son 'attacked with a nail gun '
text: a man found with horrific facial injuries in borrowash on friday told people who went to help him he 'd been attacked with a nail gun , bbc radio derby reports .
the 22-year-old , who has been named locally , as nathan paton was found wandering the street covered in blood .
author: Khia Lewis-Todd
BBC Local Live

documents.title: borrowash death : woman named
text: police have named the woman who was killed in borrowash on friday as 38-year-old claire nagle .
she died after being assaulted on charnwood avenue on friday .
derbyshire police are linking the attack to the death of a 44-year-old man , named locally as vincent nagle , who was hit by a lorry on the m1 .
author: Khia Lewis-Todd
BBC Local Live
